Comment: sub as in subreddit (informal) vs prefix (formal)
s'il vous plais (informal) vs plaire a (formal)
ellipsis character used in formal, vs three periods in informal
contracted form of 'is' dominates in informal, vs possessive in formal
post - as in reddit post (informal) vs apres (formal)
maison' dominant in informal, vs 'chez' in formal
most common is 'essayer' for both, but 'tenter' more common in formal than in informal
avoir l'impression (informal), vs sentir (formal). Also more 1st person conjugation in informal.
infinitive more common in formal, conjugated 1p more common in informal
